elements.name: The user sends a valid get request

steps.name: the user sends a GET request to "/postcodes/{POSTCODE}"
the endpoint returns status 200
the content type is "application/json"
print the country and region for the given postcode

elements.name: The user sends a valid get request

steps.name: the user sends a GET request to validate endpoint "/postcodes/{POSTCODE}/validate"
validate  status code is 200
validate the content type is "application/json"
validate status and result of the given postcode

elements.name: The user sends a valid get request

steps.name: the user sends a GET request to find nearest postcodes "/postcodes/{POSTCODE}/nearest"
the nearest endpoint returns status 200
the nearest endpoint content type is "application/json"
the payload data reflects the nearest postcodes, their countries and regions

elements.name: (Negative) The user sends an invalid get request
